title: Drawing, Project for the top of a painted frame of an altar, ca. 1560
title_raw: Project for the top of a painted frame of an altar
medium: Pen and ink. Various water color washes; gold. Varnished. Pencil (added later). Paper
inscribed: Inscribed on mount: Coll G.W. Reid
description: Two angels seated upon a socle on top of an entablature hold an escutcheon in which the dove is represented. "(C)VIVS/ (LIVORE) SANATI / (SU)MVS" (IS. c. 53, v. 5) is written on an escutcheon before the center of the entablature. Two women, probably representing sibyls, sit upon the corners.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Project for the top of a painted frame of an altar, ca. 1560. Pen and ink. Various water color washes; gold. Varnished. Pencil (added later). Paper. 
1946-15-1
